comments.body: If pod has initContainers, should we validate its profile too?
I don't know if the format here is guaranteed

I looked into it a bit, and couldn't find the profiles format documented anywhere (AppArmor documentation seems scarce), but I did find the [kernel implementation](https://github.com/torvalds/linux/blob/master/security/apparmor/apparmorfs.c#L748), and the [parsing](http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~apparmor-dev/apparmor/release-2.7/view/head:/utils/aa-status#L93) done by the `aa-status` tool. I updated the parsing to be a bit more precise.
